FILE: cm220344v11.0.txt
DYAD: FRANCE - CROATIA
RIVALRY: RIV548
DISPUTE(S): MID4048 

PS: 20130701-20209999 1.00

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: Croatia becomes full member of EU; therefore, relationship is coded as 1.00.

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220222
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220222

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4048 

TERRMID: MID4048 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4048 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4048 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID4048 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID4048 from Gibler (2018), Croatian forces killed two French peacekeepers who were stationed in the area due to the Yugoslav Wars. France responded by deploying an aircraft carrier in the Adriatic Sea. Coded third party link to territorial MID because France was intervening in the Yugoslav Wars, a series of territorial disputes. 

MARITMID: MID4048 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4048 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4048 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4048 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4048 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4048 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4048 the Yugoslav Wars involved militarized rebel groups organized along ethnic lines. Coded civil war MID because there were militaried rebel groups in Croatia that contributed to the fighting and the need for peacekeeping forces. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4048 1 -- civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4048 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID4048 coded civil war link because the Yugoslav Wars involved militarized rebel groups fighitng in other countries outside of this dyad. The rebel groups contributed to the fighting and to the demand for peacekeeping forces. 

COUPMID: MID4048 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4048 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4048 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4048 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4048
rivalry=220344 nationa=FRANCE nationb=CROATIA MID4048 19930126-19930100 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

France sent an aircraft carrier to the Adriatic because of the recent killing of two French peacekeepers by Croatian forces. First day of dispute was on 1/26/1993 and last day of dispute was on 1/00/1993.

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:
MID4048 France sent an aircraft carrier to the Adriatic because of the recent killing of two French peacekeepers by Croatian forces.

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
